title: Spacecraft-collected fluxgate magnetometer, Decimated TeleMetry High, DSL, GSE and GSM coordinates - V. Angelopoulos, U. Auster & K.H. Glassmeier and W. Baumjohann (UCB, TUBS and IWF respectively, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, U. Auster & K.H. Glassmeier and W. Baumjohann @ UCB, TUBS and IWF respectively, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: thc_fgm_fge_quality
parameters.description: FGM-FGE Data Quality (0: Good data, 1:boom not deployed, 2:in shadow, 3:uncorrected shadow, 4:noisy waveforms)

parameters.name: thc_fge_btotalQ
parameters.description: (Good data only) FGE magnetic field B magnitude . This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thc_fge_btotal', 'thc_fgm_fge_quality']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thc_fge_gseQ
parameters.description: ---- FGE (engineering mode) magnetic field B in XYZ GSE Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thc_fge_gse', 'thc_fgm_fge_quality']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thc_fge_gsmQ
parameters.description: ---- FGE (engineering mode) magnetic field B in XYZ GSM Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thc_fge_gsm', 'thc_fgm_fge_quality']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.description: ---- FGE (engineering mode) magnetic field B in DSL Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thc_fge_dsl', 'thc_fgm_fge_quality']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thc_fge_sslQ
parameters.description: ---- FGE (engineering mode) magnetic field B in SSL Coordinates. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_fgm_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thc_fge_ssl', 'thc_fgm_fge_quality']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thc_fge_btotal
parameters.description: (All Qualities) FGE (engineering) magnetic field B magnitude

parameters.name: thc_fge_gse
parameters.description: ---- FGE (engineering mode) magnetic field B in XYZ GSE Coordinates

parameters.name: thc_fge_gsm
parameters.description: ---- FGE magnetic field B in XYZ GSM Coordinates

parameters.name: thc_fge_dsl
parameters.description: ---- FGE magnetic field B in XYZ DSL (Despun Spacecraft) Coordinates
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: BXYZ Despun Spacecraft Coordinate, nT units

parameters.name: thc_fge_ssl
parameters.description: ---- FGE magnetic field B in XYZ SSL (Spinning Spacecraft) Coordinates
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: BXYZ Spinning Spacecraft Coordinate, nT units
